# Bangladesh

## Overview

Bangladesh is a densely populated country in South Asia, located in the Bengal delta. It is the eighth most populous country in the world.

## Key Facts

- **Capital**: Dhaka
- **Official Language**: Bengali
- **Currency**: Bangladeshi Taka
- **Government**: Parliamentary republic
- **GDP**: $460 billion (2023)

## Geography

Bangladesh is largely a flat, riverine country formed by the Ganges-Brahmaputra delta. It has extensive coastline on the Bay of Bengal and is prone to flooding during monsoon season.

## Economy

Bangladesh has one of the fastest-growing economies in the world. The garment industry is the largest export sector, making Bangladesh the second-largest garment exporter globally after China.
